sentence: although I lived on st pete beach for awhile and moved back to Ohio this was my first experience at trade winds grand
The beds were very soft I suspect with memory foam and we slept well on them

It ’l net you a t shirt in the end but either way you really have to find these places and experience them like Redbeards Shark Tooth Tavern that is tucked away in the resort with some live music playing in the evenings like a small fishing town tavern
I can go on and on about our experience but my fingers are tired
We were expecting an upscale reserved atmosphere The Cezar based on the website photos
Our experience was not optimal but in the spirit of honesty I can not blame the hotel for not meeting our expectations when we failed to make our due diligence
Phone and internet issues pretty much the worst I have experienced
House keeping not the best when knocking on door early in the morning the slide was available but nothing else from their aqua experience
something I have NEVER experienced at any other hotel usually it is just first come first serve
I am not sure why they are working behind the scenes I am sure they are great at what they do
Nicest atmosphere on the beach

We did the paddle boating swimming in the 2 pools a nice experience and delicious ice cream at the nearby shop as well as mini golf and fun at the well groomed beach front and comfortable cabanas The facility was very clean and the staff nice and helpful
They were all sweet to our son and made him feel special on his birthday and made the whole experience very enjoyable
Thank you TradeWinds for helping create fabulous memories
The atmosphere is vibrant and electric
My general vibe from the resort is that it is definitely one of those places that has history with families and those families who have been coming here for decades LOVE it
Great vacation atmosphere
The Living room has a sofa bed and each of the two rooms has a wet bar with a mini fridge a microwave and full place settings
Everything came together for an amazing experience for us and we will definitely be returning in the future
The employees made the experience at TW Island Grand great
